title: Start-Ups Picked by Disney Hint at Future Tech for Children
text:
Start-Ups Picked by Disney Hint at Future Tech for Children By The New York Times October 8, 2015 Joel Gibbard, the chief of Open Bionics, presented his company at a Disney "accelerator" event. Credit: The Walt Disney Company 
How will Disney use technology to captivate the children of the future?
